page.title: 20ANIMALS AND INSECTS.
page.content: Around Auchnagatt we have a lots of animals they are:Hedgehogs,Mice,Hares, Moles,Rabbits,Foxes and Deers. You will find{Moles}nearly anywhere. for a while we had them in our garden. {Mice}feed on seeds and other plants. I don't like them. {Hedgehogs}have prickles all over themselves.They eat plants and small Vertebrates. {Rabbits and Hares }Run around wild in the fields all over the place. Around Auchnagatt there is a lot of insects there is Spiders,ladybirds and greenflys.Spiders mainly live in houses.In our house we find them in our bath,I am the only in my family that likes them.Ladybirds are small brightly coloured beatles.I like ladybirds because they eat greenflies. You find greenflies about trees.
